interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: U Beauty Preface Kit | Skin Care Gift Value Set with Retinol, Vitamin C Serum Anti-Aging Essentials Skin Tightening Arm Cream + Facial Hyaluronic Acid Morning and Night - 2.7oz (Set of 3)
Review Date: 2022/06/15
Store: U Beauty
Product Description: ['Our three cult-favorite hero products in an exclusive getaway-ready kit: The essential Travel Trio features the Resurfacing Compound 15ml, SUPER Hydrator 15ml, and SCULPT Arm Compound 50ml.']
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Brand': 'U Beauty', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Use for': 'Neck, Face', 'Item Volume': '15 Milliliters', 'Product Dimensions': '6.5 x 4.33 x 7.87 inches; 1.35 Pounds', 'UPC': '850022804137', 'Manufacturer': 'U Beauty', 'Country of Origin': 'Italy'}
Review Text: Nice kit,  full size bottles. arm firming compound has strong rubbing alcohol scent is my only semi-complaint. Otherwise very nice. Large amount, beautiful kit. No strong scent to the moisturizers or the arm compound after the alcohol scent evaporates.
Review Title: Full size bottles
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
35pcs Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit ADIMANIS Eyebrow Powder One Step Brow Stamp and Shaping Kit Eyebrow Stencils Eyebrows Shape Reusable Eyebrow Brush, Hairline Powder Contouring Stick (Light Brown)
ADIMANIS
{'Brand': 'ADIMANIS', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable, Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Waterproof', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 4.13 x 1.65 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '761325190127'}
All the stencils and the purple t shape stencils are not long enough for my brows but otherwise work as described. The powder does not. Can't get enough powder on the presser to do any good. Doesn't show up well and not enough powder to really transfer or even do 1 brow without repressing the powder multiple times. I use the stencils with another kit. The powder and powder applicator are a joke
Powder didn't work at all
Multi-Purpose Electric Massage Gel & Oil Warmer, Wax Melter, Includes Aluminum Warming Pot (16.9 fl oz), Knob Dial To Adjust Temperature (95F to 257F), With LCD Screen
EROTICGEL
{'Package Dimensions': '7.83 x 7.72 x 7.6 inches; 1.77 Pounds', 'UPC': '754590183604'}
[[VIDEOID:c9f78d09ec648d2bdc92f5ad9698e698]] The look of this is very modern and I like that you can see an actual degree not just high, medium, low. The soft wax pots from my old warmer have a lot of space on the sides even with the removable insert, but it still heats and melted them nicely.  My problem comes with the shape of the warmer.  I scrape the side of the stick that I'm not using on the edge of the pot to conserve my wax and the round shape makes it tip if I do this too hard.  It only comes with the warmer and the removable pot.  To not come with any more than that i feel like $50 is kind of steep.  (At the time of writing this $39.99 which is more reasonable.  The bottom glows red or green letting you know if your wax is up to temp. Its nice and looks nice, but not great for my usage.
Looks great but not practical for me
Earfodo Long Blonde Wigs for Women Ombre Dirty Blonde Wig with Bangs Middle Part Heat Resistant Layered Synthetic Wig For Women Daily Party Wear 21 Inch Natural Looking
Earfodo
{'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Brand': 'Earfodo', 'Cartoon Character': 'American', 'Package Dimensions': '11.5 x 7.32 x 2.56 inches; 9.59 Ounces'}
The color on this is gorgeous, but it has a lot of issues.  The bangs are hard to get right.  They don't really part in a specific place and just want to hang forward.  The lengths of the bangs and layers are made for a longer face.  The longer layers have way more on one side than the other and both sides point in the same direction.  (Makes a "C" shape around the face) also even after paying it and pulling it forward the side hairs hang away from the face when you lean.  So much that you can see the line of the wig and my hairline.  The cap is so big that even with a wig cap and 3 clips this keeps pulling back so much it shows inches of my hairline.  I wish this was better because I really like this blonde, but this wig is not for me
Beautiful color but cap is huge and style is crooked
Vegan Mia - USDA Organic Radiance Superfruit Cleansing Oil and Make-up Remover, Oil Cleanser and Makeup Remover Oil for Dry Skin and Other Skin Types, Loaded with Moisturizer Essential Fatty Acids, Rich in Antioxidants, Truly Natural Skincare, (With No Added Fragrance) 3.4 fl oz
Vegan Mia
{'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Vegan Mia', 'Scent': 'Natural aroma of fruit oils - No fragrance added', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '6.34 x 1.77 x 1.73 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '762530483363', 'Manufacturer': 'Vegan Mia'}
I do not recommend this at all. It smells absolutely terrible. Leaves a thick greasy film on your skin that's hard to get off.  Smells like vegetable or olive oil.  More like something you'd cook with than put on your skin. Does remove the makeup but at the cost of smelling like a fry cook. Sorry but gross
Smells like cooking oil. Leaves grease on face
Mocossmy Cross Nail Art Charms Decoration,72 PCS Gold Silver 3D Mini Metal Punk Vintage Cross Designs Mixed Types Retro Acrylic Nail Jewelry Accessories for Women Girls DIY Manicure Crafts Decoration
Mocossmy
{}
these are SOO much nicer than I expected.  I almost feel like they're too nice to waste on my nails. (im a biter and they get torn up with my job so they don't last long for me) These are real metal, some with inlaid jewels. I love the heave metal slightly aged look. silver and gold/Bronze pack. slight curve to the back so they fit the curve of the nail nicely. (especially helps with larger trinkets, if not they will stick up from the nail toward the sides and leave a gap that has to be filled in) These don't do that. super nice! highly recommend
SO nice! real metal!
Cfalaicos Women Short Curly Bob Wavy Wig for Cosplay Party Halloween Heat Resistant Wigs Full Head Wig with Free Wig Cap (Rainbow)
Cfalaicos
{'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '14 x 10 x 10 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'Cfalaicos', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '14 x 10 x 10 inches; 7.05 Ounces'}
The colors were only so-so and the cut and the part are off. I wanted to like this way more than I actually do. 😕
Wanted to like this more than i did

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Beauty Focus**: The user continues to explore a diverse array of beauty accessories including eyebrow grooming products and nail art, while also expanding into skincare with an emphasis on anti-aging essentials and practical kits for convenience.
- **Performance Expectations**: They maintain high standards for product performance, demonstrated by their mixed experience with a skincare kit that met most of their needs but had minor usability concerns, reflecting their keen appreciation for quality.
- **Product Usability**: Valuing ease of use, the user favors products that deliver practical results with straightforward application techniques, seeking reliable beauty solutions across both cosmetic and skincare categories.
- **Quality Concerns**: The user's critical eye for performance is evident, as they express dissatisfaction when products fall short of their expectations. Their attention to detail influences their evaluation of skincare products as much as beauty accessories.
- **Review Behavior**: Consistently leaving detailed and constructive reviews, the user shares both positive and negative experiences, emphasizing their commitment to informing fellow consumers about product effectiveness and quality.
- **Material Preferences**: The user maintains a strong preference for sustainable, eco-friendly options, balancing performance with environmental responsibility in both beauty and skincare purchases.
- **Design and Practicality**: Their appreciation for aesthetics is coupled with a focus on practicality and comfort, guiding their choices in beauty and skincare products that embody both style and usability.

Overall, the user's discerning approach drives them to seek exceptional tools and accessories that meet their rigorous expectations for quality, usability, and sustainability across beauty-related categories.
